Test Case Name: TC01_Verify ZC 3676 Auto-Added to Umbrella When ZC 3339 Added to GL_Casualty_New Business_AC1
Description: The objective of this test case is to validate that Exclusion - Designated Professional Services ZC 3676 is automatically added as a suggested exclusion in umbrella when ZC 3339 is present on GL
Action: 1. Initiate a Domestic submission with casualty LOB
Expected Result: 1. User should be able to create a submission successfully
Test Repository Path: CAMS-2736 ZC 3339 and ZC 3676 Exclusion Auto-Application

Action: 2. Navigate to Line selection screen and select GL and Umbrella LOBs
Expected Result: 2. User should be able to navigate to line selection screen and select both GL and Umbrella LOBs

Action: 3. Navigate to GL Exposures screen
Expected Result: 3. User should be able to view the GL Exposures screen with all required fields

Action: 4. Add Exclusion - Designated Professional Services ZC 3339 to GL
Expected Result: 4. User should be able to successfully add ZC 3339 exclusion to GL sub-line

Action: 5. Navigate to Umbrella sub-line screen
Expected Result: 5. User should be able to view the Umbrella sub-line screen

Action: 6. Verify ZC 3676 suggested exclusion appears in Umbrella
Expected Result: 6. User should see Exclusion - Designated Professional Services ZC 3676 displayed as a suggested exclusion in Umbrella

Action: 7. Verify ZC 3676 is linked to ZC 3339
Expected Result: 7. User should verify that ZC 3676 is automatically linked to the ZC 3339 exclusion added in GL

Test Case Name: TC02_Verify ZC 3676 Auto-Added to Umbrella When Umbrella LOB Selected_Casualty_New Business_AC1
Description: The objective of this test case is to validate that ZC 3676 is auto-added when umbrella is selected after ZC 3339 is added to GL
Action: 1. Initiate a Domestic submission with casualty LOB
Expected Result: 1. User should be able to create a submission successfully
Test Repository Path: CAMS-2736 ZC 3339 and ZC 3676 Exclusion Auto-Application

Action: 2. Navigate to Line selection screen and select GL LOB only
Expected Result: 2. User should be able to select GL LOB

Action: 3. Navigate to GL Exposures screen and add ZC 3339 exclusion
Expected Result: 3. User should be able to add ZC 3339 exclusion to GL successfully

Action: 4. Return to Line selection screen and add Umbrella LOB
Expected Result: 4. User should be able to add Umbrella LOB to the submission

Action: 5. Navigate to Umbrella sub-line screen
Expected Result: 5. User should be able to view the Umbrella sub-line screen

Action: 6. Verify ZC 3676 suggested exclusion appears in Umbrella
Expected Result: 6. User should see ZC 3676 displayed as a suggested exclusion automatically

Test Case Name: TC03_Verify Ability to Remove ZC 3676 from Umbrella_Casualty_New Business_AC2
Description: The objective of this test case is to validate that user can remove ZC 3676 when it is already selected in umbrella
Action: 1. Initiate a Domestic submission with casualty LOB with GL and Umbrella selected
Expected Result: 1. User should be able to create a submission successfully
Test Repository Path: CAMS-2736 ZC 3339 and ZC 3676 Exclusion Auto-Application

Action: 2. Navigate to GL Exposures screen and add ZC 3339 exclusion
Expected Result: 2. User should be able to add ZC 3339 exclusion to GL

Action: 3. Navigate to Umbrella sub-line screen
Expected Result: 3. User should be able to view ZC 3676 as a suggested exclusion in Umbrella

Action: 4. Verify ZC 3676 is displayed in the exclusions list
Expected Result: 4. User should see ZC 3676 in the Umbrella exclusions list

Action: 5. Select the option to remove ZC 3676 from Umbrella
Expected Result: 5. User should be able to remove ZC 3676 exclusion from Umbrella

Action: 6. Verify ZC 3676 is removed from Umbrella
Expected Result: 6. User should confirm that ZC 3676 is no longer present in Umbrella exclusions

Action: 7. Verify removal does not impact GL exclusions
Expected Result: 7. User should verify that ZC 3339 remains unchanged in GL

Test Case Name: TC04_Verify ZC 3676 Removal When ZC 3339 Removed from GL_Casualty_New Business_AC3
Description: The objective of this test case is to validate that ZC 3676 is automatically removed from umbrella when ZC 3339 is removed from GL
Action: 1. Initiate a Domestic submission with casualty LOB with GL and Umbrella
Expected Result: 1. User should be able to create a submission successfully
Test Repository Path: CAMS-2736 ZC 3339 and ZC 3676 Exclusion Auto-Application

Action: 2. Navigate to GL Exposures screen and add ZC 3339 exclusion
Expected Result: 2. User should be able to add ZC 3339 exclusion to GL

Action: 3. Navigate to Umbrella sub-line screen and verify ZC 3676 is added
Expected Result: 3. User should see ZC 3676 automatically added to Umbrella

Action: 4. Navigate back to GL Exposures screen
Expected Result: 4. User should be able to navigate back to GL screen

Action: 5. Remove ZC 3339 exclusion from GL
Expected Result: 5. User should be able to remove ZC 3339 exclusion successfully

Action: 6. Navigate to Umbrella sub-line screen
Expected Result: 6. User should be able to navigate to Umbrella screen

Action: 7. Verify ZC 3676 is automatically removed from Umbrella
Expected Result: 7. User should confirm that ZC 3676 is no longer present in Umbrella

Test Case Name: TC05_Verify VAL-559 Triggered for Duplicate Schedule Items_Casualty_New Business_AC4
Description: The objective of this test case is to validate that VAL-559 is triggered when duplicate entries exist in schedule items between ZC 3339 and ZC 3676
Action: 1. Initiate a Domestic submission with casualty LOB with GL and Umbrella
Expected Result: 1. User should be able to create a submission successfully
Test Repository Path: CAMS-2736 ZC 3339 and ZC 3676 Exclusion Auto-Application

Action: 2. Navigate to GL Exposures screen and add ZC 3339 with schedule items
Expected Result: 2. User should be able to add ZC 3339 exclusion with schedule items to GL

Action: 3. Navigate to Umbrella sub-line screen and add duplicate schedule items to ZC 3676
Expected Result: 3. User should be able to add ZC 3676 with duplicate schedule items in Umbrella

Action: 4. Fill all mandatory fields in all required screens
Expected Result: 4. User should be able to complete all mandatory field entries

Action: 5. Click Price button
Expected Result: 5. System should trigger VAL-559 validation error

Action: 6. Verify VAL-559 error message is displayed
Expected Result: 6. User should see error message indicating duplicate entries in schedule items between ZC 3339 and ZC 3676

Action: 7. Verify pricing is blocked until duplicate items are resolved
Expected Result: 7. User should not be able to proceed with pricing until duplicates are resolved

Test Case Name: TC06_Verify VAL-559 Triggered for Mismatched Schedule Item Count_Casualty_New Business_AC4
Description: The objective of this test case is to validate that VAL-559 is triggered when schedule item counts mismatch between ZC 3339 and ZC 3676
Action: 1. Initiate a Domestic submission with casualty LOB with GL and Umbrella
Expected Result: 1. User should be able to create a submission successfully
Test Repository Path: CAMS-2736 ZC 3339 and ZC 3676 Exclusion Auto-Application

Action: 2. Navigate to GL Exposures screen and add ZC 3339 with 5 schedule items
Expected Result: 2. User should be able to add ZC 3339 exclusion with multiple schedule items to GL

Action: 3. Navigate to Umbrella sub-line screen and add ZC 3676 with 3 schedule items
Expected Result: 3. User should be able to add ZC 3676 with different number of schedule items in Umbrella

Action: 4. Fill all mandatory fields in all required screens
Expected Result: 4. User should be able to complete all mandatory field entries

Action: 5. Click Price button
Expected Result: 5. System should trigger VAL-559 validation error

Action: 6. Verify VAL-559 error message is displayed for mismatched counts
Expected Result: 6. User should see error message indicating mismatch in number of schedule items between ZC 3339 and ZC 3676

Action: 7. Verify pricing is blocked until counts are matched
Expected Result: 7. User should not be able to proceed with pricing until schedule item counts are reconciled

Test Case Name: TC07_Verify UW-418 Triggered When ZC 3339 Present Without ZC 3676_Casualty_New Business_AC5
Description: The objective of this test case is to validate that UW-418 is triggered when attempting to price with ZC 3339 in GL but without ZC 3676 in Umbrella
Action: 1. Initiate a Domestic submission with casualty LOB with GL and Umbrella
Expected Result: 1. User should be able to create a submission successfully
Test Repository Path: CAMS-2736 ZC 3339 and ZC 3676 Exclusion Auto-Application

Action: 2. Navigate to GL Exposures screen and add ZC 3339 exclusion
Expected Result: 2. User should be able to add ZC 3339 exclusion to GL

Action: 3. Navigate to Umbrella sub-line screen
Expected Result: 3. User should be able to view the Umbrella sub-line screen

Action: 4. Verify ZC 3676 is displayed as a suggested exclusion
Expected Result: 4. User should see ZC 3676 as a suggested exclusion

Action: 5. Manually remove ZC 3676 from Umbrella exclusions
Expected Result: 5. User should be able to remove the suggested ZC 3676 exclusion

Action: 6. Fill all mandatory fields in all required screens
Expected Result: 6. User should be able to complete all mandatory field entries

Action: 7. Click Price button
Expected Result: 7. System should trigger UW-418 blocking error

Action: 8. Verify UW-418 error message is displayed
Expected Result: 8. User should see error message UW-418 indicating that ZC 3676 is required in Umbrella when ZC 3339 is present in GL

Action: 9. Verify Quote button is disabled
Expected Result: 9. User should not be able to proceed to Quote stage

Test Case Name: TC08_Verify UW-418 Not Triggered When Both Exclusions Present_Casualty_New Business_AC5
Description: The objective of this test case is to validate that UW-418 is NOT triggered when both ZC 3339 and ZC 3676 are properly present
Action: 1. Initiate a Domestic submission with casualty LOB with GL and Umbrella
Expected Result: 1. User should be able to create a submission successfully
Test Repository Path: CAMS-2736 ZC 3339 and ZC 3676 Exclusion Auto-Application

Action: 2. Navigate to GL Exposures screen and add ZC 3339 exclusion
Expected Result: 2. User should be able to add ZC 3339 exclusion to GL

Action: 3. Navigate to Umbrella sub-line screen and verify ZC 3676 is auto-added
Expected Result: 3. User should see ZC 3676 automatically added to Umbrella

Action: 4. Fill all mandatory fields in all required screens
Expected Result: 4. User should be able to complete all mandatory field entries

Action: 5. Click Price button
Expected Result: 5. System should process pricing without UW-418 error

Action: 6. Verify pricing is successful and UW-418 is not triggered
Expected Result: 6. User should see pricing completed successfully without UW-418 blocking error

Action: 7. Click Quote button
Expected Result: 7. User should be able to proceed to Quote stage

Action: 8. Verify quote document is generated successfully
Expected Result: 8. User should see the quote document generated and displayed
